Mysterious Butler:
This title has been granted with my master's authority to the clan that produced this week's winner, the greatest warrior. This title is given to just one clan among all the clans.
It is given at the beginning of a new week to the clan that is associated with the greatest warrior. The title doesn't transfer, even if that warrior switches to another clan.
It grants a special buff that gives a little bit of help to nearby clan members who belong to the greatest clan.
